title: Bluedawn
description: Book 2 of the Watermagic NovelsBeautiful, Wicked, Mysterious. High School Senior, Hailey Maize, the daughter of Josette and cousin to the très beaux, is beach camping with her parents when she meets a devilishly handsome boy. He takes her to a beach party under the stars where she meets his beautiful, mysterious friends who play music and dance like apparitions before a bonfire.After this mesmerizing night, Hailey finds herself turned into a siren and trapped in a world of five star hotels, shopping sprees, and late night parties. The only way she can survive is to eat human flesh.But in this world of horror, Hailey falls madly in love with the boy of her dreams. Together they set out to escape a life that appears glamorous on the surface, but dark and demented beneath.Now they must unite with the très beaux to fight the sirens.
author: Brighton Hill
